sqls.sql: SELECT cr_rtn_h_id, sn_no, part_no, part_name, part_spec, part_unit, part_unit_name, part_idt, mrp_region_no, lot_no, invp_no, invp_name, part_qty, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk1, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk2, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk3, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk4, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk5, cr_rtn_sn_part_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM cr_rtn_sn_part WHERE cr_rtn_sn_part_id = @cr_rtn_sn_part_id;
